casebody.data:
BRADLEY
v.
MISSION HOSPITALS. No. 25PA07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. David Gantt, Asheville, for Bradley. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 638 S.E.2d 254 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of June 2007 by Defendant (Mission Health System) to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
